name: @incubateur-ademe/nosgestesclimat
description: Le modèle de calcul d'empreinte climat individuelle de consommation

scripts.compile:md: node scripts/rulesToJSON.mjs --markdown && node scripts/personasToJSON.js --markdown && node scripts/documentationToJSON.js --markdown
scripts.compile: node scripts/rulesToJSON.mjs && node scripts/personasToJSON.js && node scripts/documentationToJSON.js
scripts.compile:fr: node scripts/rulesToJSON.mjs -o FR && node scripts/personasToJSON.js && node scripts/documentationToJSON.js
scripts.compile:rules-watch: nodemon -e "publicodes yaml js mjs" --watch data/ --watch scripts/ scripts/rulesToJSON.mjs
scripts.compile:rules-watch:fr: nodemon -e "publicodes yaml js mjs" --watch data/ --watch scripts/ scripts/rulesToJSON.mjs -t fr -o FR
scripts.compile-watch: nodemon -e "publicodes yaml js mjs" --watch data/ --watch scripts/ scripts/rulesToJSON.mjs & nodemon -e publicodes --watch personas/ scripts/personasToJSON.js & nodemon -e md --watch contenu-ecrit/ scripts/documentationToJSON.js
scripts.dev: yarn run compile-watch & yarn run serve
scripts.dev:rules-fr: yarn run compile:rules-watch:fr & yarn run serve
